utils

Class OAuth2

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.OAuth2

  • public class OAuth2
extends java.lang.Object
    Library to access ressources protected by OAuth 2.0. For OAuth 1.0a, see play.libs.OAuth. See the facebook-oauth2 example for usage.
